title: 338: Holiday Drama + Bekah & Grayston’s Relationship Story
itunes:title: 338: Holiday Drama + Bekah & Grayston’s Relationship Story
description:
First The Broads catch up after their holidays and discuss the drama, the fights, and the good times. Then they rerelease an episode that had been previously recorded December 10th, 2019 - Bekah was currently pregnant with their second child, Frank, and her and Grayston sat together for the first time on the podcast and got very honest about how they first met, their initial dates, what happened after they found out Bekah was pregnant with Ruth, how they both felt about each other, how their relationship transformed, and then answered some questions from the #broadsquad about what they love the most about each other, what they can’t stand about the other, and a whole lot more! 

 

*Join The Broads Thursday when they discuss their New Years resolutions, Bekah being off Instagram, and rerelease Evan and Jess’ relationship origin story
